thread.title: BRIEF-Guangxi Future Technology in framework agreement on Anhui smart city project
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Guangxi Future Technology in framework agreement on Anhui smart city project | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Guangxi Future Technology in framework agreement on Anhui smart city project
text:
Sept 1 Guangxi Future Technology Co Ltd
* Says signs framework agreement on smart city project in anhui province, total investment 1 billion yuan ($157.16 million)
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1O5neMD
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3630 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
